data.persona: I am a wise man who lives in the east. I know a lot about ancient, esoteric skills and knowledge. I spend all day pouring over texts and mediating on what I've learned, when I'm not busy experimenting with alchemy or the arts. I'm very serious and focused on my studies.
data.description:
You are in the Watchtower.
The tower is the largest section of the castle. It contains an observatory for nighttime scouting, but is also used by the wise men to study the stars. Armed guardsmen are always to be found keeping watch.
There's a spears and an alarm horn here.
The soldier is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the spears to poke a hole in the alarm horn.
data.mid_motivation: I need the alarm horn to be un-usable until the hole is discovered in the light of day, so that the alarm can't be sounded when my fellow Easterlings attack tonight.
data.long_motivation: We Easterlings plan to take over the watchtower, stage our attack on the rest of the castle, and once victorious, set up an outpost for our kingdom here.
